summary: Adds new items to the interior of Warmaiden's
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Century Gothic]Warmaiden's Overhaul[/font][/size][/center][center][size=4]
[/size][/center][center][size=4]Introduction:[/size][/center]
I always found Warmaiden's to be a bit boring. Being the town's main blacksmith shop (apart from Eorland), I felt that they should stock many more items than in the vanilla game. My mod expands Warmaiden's, not only in the shop's floorspace, but also in the variety of stock they have for sale, so now there's pots and pans, locks, axes, saws and knives and forks for sale, as well as the traditional Warmaiden's weapons, shields and armour.

[center][size=4]Features:[/size][/center]
• Many new static items and changes including...
• Redesigned layout with seperate downstairs and upstairs showrooms; downstairs for homeware and upstairs for armour and weapons
• Upstairs changing room
• Mannequin display showcasing their armours
• Other displays for weapons, helmets and shields
• Boot and gauntlet shelves
• Axes, saws and hoes
• Pots and pans
• And much, much more!
(Items have been made static because I thought it would be too OP to have loads of items sitting around waiting to be stolen!)
[size=4]
[/size]
[center][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/center]
No DLC is required for Warmaiden's Overhaul to work[size=2].[/size]

[center][size=4]Installation:[/size][/center]
To install, use NMM or manually drag and drop the .esp file and mesh and texture folders into Skyrim's "Data" folder.

[center][size=4]Conflicts:[/size][/center]
Will conflict with any similar mod that changes the "WhiterunWarmaidens" cell. If you experience flickering lights, this is a conflict with your lighting mod (like ELFX, RLO etc). In this case, put Warmaiden's Overhaul on top of your chosen lighting overhaul in the load order.

[center][size=4]My other mods:[/size][/center]
If you like this shop overhaul then you'll love my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54143/?]Radiant Raiment Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56131/?]Bannered Mare Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57505/?]Riverwood Trader Overhaul[/url]
author: naverd01
